instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Tap Menu . Tap People . Under "Suggestions for you," next to the person's name, tap Add people .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Open the profile of the person you want to unfollow. You can search for their name, or tap their photo next to a comment or post they've made. Tap Following (or the name of the circle they re in). Uncheck the "Following" box. Tap Done .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Tap Add a comment . Add your comment: To insert an image: Tap Add photos . To insert a link: Tap Add a link . You can also start typing a link and a preview should appear below it. To insert a link with a preview: Tap through the thumbnails to pick the photo you want to see with the link. Tap Post .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Find the comment you want to edit or delete. Tap your comment. Tap Edit comment or Delete comment . Tap Send or Ok .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Tap Add a comment or Comment . At the bottom right of the keyboard, tap Emoji . Tap GIF . To search for GIFs: Tap Search GIFs. Or below the GIF field, tap a GIF category. Tap the GIF you want to include in your comment. It will appear in the comment field. Tap Post .
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google+ app . Find the post you want to +1. Tap . Optional: To undo the +1, tap .
